member.name: IMFMediaKeySession.Close
member.summary: Closes the media key session and must be called before the key session is released.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySession.GetError
member.summary: Gets the error state associated with the media key session.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySession.get_KeySystem
member.summary: Gets the name of the key system name the media keys object was created with.
member.param: The name of the key system.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySession.get_SessionId
member.summary: Gets a unique session id created for this session.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySession.Update
member.summary: Passes in a key value with any associated data required by the Content Decryption Module for the given key system.
member.param: The count in bytes of key.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySession
member.summary: Represents a session with the Digital Rights Management (DRM) key system.
